entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Remove struct constraint from `Vector*<T>` #85893
  • JIT: Incorrect redundant branch opts example #85892
  • [API Proposal]: Add remaining binary format primitive types to BinaryReader/Writer #85891
  • Polymorphism on System.Text.Json source generation with different assemblies #85884
  • Disabling activity trace propagation for a specific HttpClientHandler with underlying BrowserHttpHandler #85883

PullRequests

Created

  • Update PropertyTabAttribute.Equals() nullability #85896
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Unroll StringBuilder.Append for const string #85894
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "FrozenObjectHandle(REF) + CNS" to a byref constant #85888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix block morphing/physical promotion self-interference #85887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Pin urllib to version 1.26.15 for perf runs #85881
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix JsonNode.To allocations #85886
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix flags checking for `GT_IND` #85890
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed link to PR guide in CONTRIBUTING.md #85876
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: fix another case of early flow graph divergence #85873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Constant folding for SIMD comparisons #85584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
